archimate:Plateau.name: OO 2: Spectrograph Bundle (Plateau)
archimate:Plateau.documentation:
The spectrograph bundle provides the archiving and Observatory Operations Data Service functions for the spectrograph device.
This system is intially deployed at the Summit. There is a need to both Disaster recover the Application Support File system, and to backup any unique file state (such as application configuration files). It is assumed these DR and Backup resources are within the VMWare deployment at the Base, given the modest requirement.
